title: Roasted sesame salmon with ginger and chilli pak choi
time: Hands on time 10 mins, 8-10 mins cooking time, plus marinating
description: A low-carb sesame salmon recipe that is packed full of fresh flavours and healthy ingredients.
ingredients: 6cm piece fresh ginger, half grated, half finely sliced
Bunch spring onions, cut into 3cm lengths
1 red chilli, deseeded and sliced into thin rounds

method.Step 1: Mix together the soy sauce, grated ginger, oils, lime juice and some black pepper. Add the salmon and turn to coat. Set aside for 10 minutes.

method.Step 2: Preheat the oven to 180°c/fan160°c/gas 4. Place the pak choi and spring onions in a large roasting tray. Scatter with the sliced ginger, and top with the salmon and marinade. Sprinkle the salmon with the sesame seeds and scatter with the chilli.

method.Step 3: Roast in the oven for 8-10 minutes until the salmon is golden brown. Divide among 4 plates and serve with steamed basmati rice.
